General.Name: Tadir-Gan (Precision Products) 1993 Ltd
General.Description: Tadir-Gan (Precision Products) 1993 Ltd., together with its subsidiary, produces, processes, and markets mechanical assemblies made of aluminum and magnesium for the automotive industry in Israel. It offers engine parts, such as oil basins, valve caps, sealing caps, parts for transfer tankers, chalk, parts of steering rods, and other products. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Afula, Israel.
General.Address: Alon Tavor Industrial Zone, Afula, Israel, 18120
